mapper.select: SELECT mee.id id , mee.name meetingName , mem1.name hostName , ca.name climbingAreaName , ca.address address , ca.price price , ca.winPrice winPrice , ca.winwinYn winwinYn , ca.closeYn closeYn , ca.description description , mee.hostDt hostDt , mee.time time , mee.criticalMeetingYn criticalMeetingYn , ms.status status , mem2.name participantName , mem2.birthDt participantbirthDt , l.level level , l.color color , d.degree degree FROM ( SELECT id , name , memberFk , climbingAreaFk , hostDt , time , criticalMeetingYn , meetingStatusFk FROM meeting WHERE id = #{id} ) mee JOIN member mem1 ON mee.memberFk = mem1.id JOIN meetingStatus ms ON mee.meetingStatusFk = ms.id JOIN climbingArea ca ON mee.climbingAreaFk = ca.id JOIN attend a ON mee.id = a.meetingFk JOIN member mem2 ON mem2.id = a.memberFk JOIN level l ON l.id = mem2.levelFk JOIN degree d ON d.id = mem2.degreeFk
SELECT id FROM meeting WHERE 1 = 1 AND hostDt = #{hostDt} AND climbingAreaFk = #{climbingAreaFk}
